Translations.Text: To DEUS belongs totus sovereignty de caelum terra! Feria Hora Judgment advenit pass ut est when falsifiers lose
Vos vide omnis community kneeling Omnis community est alias view their actum! Hodie vos get paid pro everything vos perfecit
Hoc est noster actum; it utters truth vos! Nos actum everything vos perfecit
Prout pro those believe work righteousness their Dominus admit them His mercy! Hoc est major triumph
Prout pro those disbelieve My revelations Est recited vos vos turned arrogant est wicked people
When it proclaimed deus promise est truth ut Hora Judgment inevitable vos dictus Nos non know quod Hora est Nos est foderator de conjecture it nos non est certain
Malus their works become evident to them very things they mocked advenit haunt them
It proclaimed Hodie nos forget vos just prout vos forgot meeting hoc feria. Tuus abode est hellfire vos non habet helpers
Hoc est vos took deus revelations in vain preoccupied 1 vita. Consequently they nunquam exit therefrom nor testimentum they excused
To DEUS belongs totus praise Dominus caelum Dominus terra Dominus universe
To Eum belongs totus supremacy caelum terra! He est Almighty Wise
